definition: to attend (a school)/to drop out (of college etc)
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already
certificate of partial completion/certificate of attendance (for a student who did not graduate)

sentences.english: He studied physics in Beijing University for two years.
sentences.chinese: 他曾在北京大學物理系肄業兩年。

sentences.english: In 2000, she studied the graduate courses at Xinjing Theological Seminary.
sentences.chinese: 2000年在信經神學院讀函授研究生，肄業。

sentences.english: All college and university students would benefit from spending at least one semester studying in a foreign country.
sentences.chinese: 學院或大學應該要肄業生在國外至少進修一個學期。

sentences.english: Students who complete a two-year course of study earn an associate degree.
sentences.chinese: 學生完成兩年的課程後獲取一種肄業證書。

sentences.english: He is Canadian education, using a month's vacation to changsha.
sentences.chinese: 正在加拿年夜肄業的他，行使一個月的假期來到長沙。

sentences.english: Until then, the Sunday deal gets an incomplete.
sentences.chinese: 在那之前，週日協議就只能算是“肄業”。

sentences.english: Students can transfer as sophomores before the second academic year begins.
sentences.chinese: 第二學年開始前，得申請轉入各學系二年級肄業。

sentences.english: He received his undergraduate degree from the U. S. Air Force Academy and flew Air Rescue "Jolly Greens" in Vietnam.
sentences.chinese: 他是美國空軍學院的肄業生，在越南開飛機拯救傷員。

sentences.english: With an associates degree she is pleased but not fulfilled.
sentences.chinese: 終於她拿到了肄業學位，但是她還不滿足。

sentences.english: An undergraduate who is not yet a senior.
sentences.chinese: 還沒有上大四的大學肄業生。

sentences.english: And some of the founders were too busy starting companies to finish college.
sentences.chinese: 而有些呢，則太忙於啓動一個公司以至於肄業。

definition: Zhang Juzheng (1525-1582), Grand Secretary during the Ming dynasty, credited with bringing the dynasty to its apogee
scholar preparing for imperial examinations (in former times)
old variant of 補缺|补缺[bu3 que1]
to be in overall charge/to oversee
Jinxian county in Nanchang 南昌, Jiangxi
Jianli county in Jingzhou 荊州|荆州[Jing1 zhou1], Hubei
to know how to count and do sums/numerate/numeracy
